title: Watch the best celebrations from last season
body_text:
Last season was full of fantastic celebrations on and off the pitch!
From Declan Riceâ€™s late winner at Luton Town to Gabriel Martinelli making the difference against Manchester City, supporters were richly rewarded home and away.
Press play on the video above to enjoy some of the most jubilant celebrations from 2023/24.
